original_text: The Son of Man came eating and drinking, and you say, ‘Here is a glutton and a drunkard, a friend of tax collectors and sinners.’
korean_text: 인자는 와서 먹고 마시매 너희 말이 보라 먹기를 탐하고 포도주를 즐기는 사람이요 세리와 죄인의 친구로다 하니

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man came eating and drinking
'Here is a glutton and a drunkard
a friend of tax collectors and sinners.'
